testcase.name: Login Page

testcase.name: User Search The Hotel
testcase.system-out: When users Select The Location In Location DropDown Field...................passed And users Select The Hotles In Hotel DropDown Field.........................passed And uers Select The Room Type In RoomType DropDown Field....................passed And users Select The Number Of Rooms From Number Of Rooms DropDown Field....passed And users Enter The Check In Date In Check In Date Field....................passed And users Enter The Check Out In Check Out Date Field.......................passed And users Select The Adults Per Room In Adults Per Room Field...............passed And users Select The Childrens Count Per Room In Childres Per Room Field....passed Then users Click The Search Button And Navigate To Select Hotel Page........passed

testcase.name: User Select The Hotel
testcase.system-out: When users Clicks The Radio Button..........................................passed Then users Clicks The Continue Button And Navigate To Book Hotel Page.......passed

testcase.name: User Book A Hotel
testcase.system-out: When user Enter The First Name In First Name Field..........................passed And user Enter The Last Name In Last Name Field.............................passed And user Enter The Billing Address In "Billing Address" Field...............passed And user Enter The Card Number In "1234567891234567" In Field...............passed And user Select The Credit Card Type In DropDown Field Credit Card Type.....passed And user Select Expiry Date Month And Year In Month And Year DropDown Field.passed And user Enter The Cvv Number In "321" In Field.............................passed Then user Click The Book Now Button And Wait For Confirmation...............passed

testcase.name: User Log Out The Adactin Hotel Page
